# sonatyperepo_system_config_http (Resource)

Configure the System HTTP settings

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "sonatyperepo_system_config_http" "http" {
  http_proxy = {
    enabled = false
  }
  https_proxy = {
    enabled = true
    host    = "my.proxy.tld"
    port    = 8080
    authentication = {
      enabled  = true
      username = "proxy-user"
      password = "proxy-password"
    }
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `http_proxy` (Attributes) HTTP Proxy settings (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--http_proxy))
- `https_proxy` (Attributes) HTTPS Proxy settings (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--https_proxy))

### Optional

- `non_proxy_hosts` (Set of String) Hosts to exclude from HTTP/HTTPS Proxy
- `retries` (Number) Maximum number of retry attempts if the initial connection attempt suffers a timeout
- `timeout` (Number) Time (seconds) to wait for activity before stopping and retrying the connection
- `user_agent` (String) Custom fragment to append to “User-Agent” header in HTTP requests

### Read-Only

- `last_updated` (String) String representation of the date/time the resource was last changed

### Nested Schema for `http_proxy`

Required:

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether enabled

Optional:

- `authentication` (Attributes) Proxy Authentication settings (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--http_proxy--authentication))
- `host` (String) Proxy Server Hostname
- `port` (Number) Proxy Server Port

<a id="nestedatt--http_proxy--authentication"></a>
### Nested Schema for `http_proxy.authentication`

Optional:

- `enabled` (Boolean) Proxy Authentication enabled
- `ntlm_domain` (String) Proxy NTLM Domain
- `ntlm_host` (String) Proxy NTLM Host
- `password` (String, Sensitive) Proxy Password
- `username` (String) Proxy Username

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether enabled

- `authentication` (Attributes) Proxy Authentication settings (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--https_proxy--authentication))
- `host` (String) Proxy Server Hostname
- `port` (Number) Proxy Server Port

- `ntlm_host` (String) Proxy NTLM Host
